Hello to you alla again.

The sword has arrived, it was much better that i =
thought it would be, the blade has a lot of dried oil on it , need to get t=
his off in a nice and smoth way, and i FINALY get the Tsuka off it, i under=
stand why the former owner didnt want to take it off, the mekugi has been t=
here for a long time.
But anyway i did found Mei on both sides of the Nakag=
o, i have taken 2 pictures of it , more comming on the blade, mountings,and=
 saya, when my camera are ready again.
Can anyone translate the mei=B4s on =
it???
